thread.title: London mayoral election: Zac Goldsmith 'won't be like Boris Johnson'
thread.title_full: London mayoral election: Zac Goldsmith 'won't be like Boris Johnson' - BBC News

author: BBC
title: London mayoral election: Zac Goldsmith 'won't be like Boris Johnson'
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device
London mayoral election: Zac Goldsmith 'won't be like Boris Johnson' 2 October 2015 Last updated at 13:53 BST
The Conservative Party has unveiled Zac Goldsmith as its candidate for the London mayoral election in 2016.
The London MP and environmentalist is up against the Labour MP Sadiq Khan, among others.
If he wins he will follow on from Tory Boris Johnson, who stands down next year after two terms in office.
But Mr Goldsmith told the BBC's Robin Brant he will be a different type of mayor.
Read more Zac Goldsmith chosen as Conservative London mayoral candidate What is Zac Goldsmith's pitch to London voters? Sadiq Khan: Labour's choice for mayor
